content: I am planning to edit the base.html template to insert a few minor css tweaks in its header. Is there a way to make the added stylings conditional on the theme (dark/light)?
@Plankter I'm not sure what you have in mind -- base.html is shared for all pages including the login page.

The Zulip configured color scheme can't be available except when logged in, but you can use https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color-scheme for logged-out pages to get what the user has setup in their browser.
(Our default for the web app is to use the browser's color scheme, but you can override that)
Thanks! I can selectively modify the css by combiningprefers-color-scheme and color_scheme.
